text: only a few hours drive from Thailand's
main tourist beaches is the village of
pakala way it is ground zero for
Thailand surge of troops into its
troubled southern provinces where ethnic
Malay Muslims are battling for autonomy
from Thailand's buddhist-majority the
increase in security forces has helped
quell the violence but still more than
3,500 people have been killed since 2004
to appeal to villagers the army has
initiated rash of hearts and minds
projects under the slogan understanding
accessing development there weren't any
doctors around here in the past which
made approaching the locals very hard
people saw armed soldiers and it scared
them dr. Pyong paya patch PES I a 27
year old army doctor wears body armor
but is unarmed his medics carry m16
assault rifles and his assistant carries
both the medical equipment and a colt 45
handgun in the pockets of his
bulletproof vest patani is unit 24 at
three doctors now I started the program
so ultimately I'm responsible I go from
house to house looking in like an x-ray
machine through till the last village
villagers were polite when receiving
medical treatment but local officials
have said they want the military to lead
